content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Endpoint Inventory Enhancements July 11, 2024—You can now customize the table in Endpoint Inventory by adjusting column width and the number of items displayed per page. Your settings are saved automatically for the next time you access Endpoint Inventory. Endpoint Security → Endpoint Inventory © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated.
